did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, lecture and research notes, course materials, financial and subject files, manuscripts, printed materials, photographs, diagrams, glass slides and negatives, movie film, tape recording.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Personal and professional papers and materials of Cornell University professor of psychobiology, founder of the Behavior Farm Laboratory.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Howard Scott Liddell, 1895-1962, was professor of psychology and psychobiology and founded and directed the Behavior Farm Laboratory at Cornell University. Following Liddell's death, the lab was renamed the Liddell Laboratory of Comparative and Physiological Psychology.

chronitem.event: Cornell Univ. Chairman of Dept. of Physiology in the Medical College

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p:
Personal papers include school notebooks, 1920's, and miscellany. Professional papers include correspondence, acknowledgements, recommendations for students, Department of Psychology and Behavior Farm Laboratory correspondence; conference and lecture notes, manuscripts, programs, and memos, 1952-1963; student notes, rollbooks, and course materials; research notebooks and files, ca. 1930-1959; Department of Psychology financial files, 1926-1963, and subject files on topics including the Behavior Farm, equipment, and procedures; manuscripts and printed materials include reprints by Liddell and other authors; also visual materials such as photograph albums, diagrams, glass slides and negatives, and movie film dealing with pig, sheep, dog, and goat experiments at the Behavior Farm. Correspondents include the American Russian Institute, American Society for Research in Psychosomatic
Problems, Association for Advancement of Psychoanalysis, W. Horsley Gantt, A. U. Moore, Leon J. Saul, J. Paul Scott, graduate students, publishers, and other scientists and psychologists.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: American Society for Research in Psychosomatic Problems
Association for the Advancement of Psychoanalysis

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Howard S. Liddell Papers, #14-23-1466. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
